Articles.Content:
Hi i play DMP with freinds and i have a few questions. (Only version 1.2.2)

So, i like doing dogfights (who doesn't!?)  but when i shoot the other player doesn't see the shots.

When the other player is turning his craft, his plane jigs about from one place to another like suddenly up or down.

Also somtimes the plane makes copies of itself.

Thanks!
